mapper.select: SELECT p.id as id, p.name as name, p.info as info, p.thumbnail as thumbnail, p.price as price, p.unit as unit, p.status as status, p.images as images, c.id as c_id, c.name as c_name FROM product p LEFT JOIN category c ON p.category_id = c.id WHERE p.id = #{id} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (category_id, name, info, thumbnail, price, unit, status, images) VALUES (#{category.id}, #{name}, #{info}, #{thumbnail}, #{price}, #{unit}, #{status}, #{images, typeHandler=wbh.wilfred.ivege.data.mybatis.typehandler.JsonHandler})
